                                                            org.helm.notation.StructureException
        Transfer a polymer notation nucleic acid sequence into a graph
        Parameters:
        polymerNotation - - simplePolymerNotation of format R(A)P.R(G)P.[mR](A)P.R([mA]).P
        withStarting - - if we should have a 5' node
        Returns:
        rna graph
        Throws:
        org.helm.notation.MonomerException
